meta.judul_bab: Latihan Soal Advertisement - 9 SMP Semester Genap

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text carefully!

**GRAND OPENING!**
**FLAVOR PARADISE RESTAURANT**

Come and taste our delicious local and international cuisines.
We provide the best romantic atmosphere for you and your partner.
**Special Promo:**
Buy 1 Get 1 Free for Steak Menu on Saturday Night!

Located at: Jl. Merdeka No. 45, Bandung.
Open daily: 10.00 am - 10.00 pm

What is the writer's intention in writing the text?
soal_pg.opsi_a: To describe the Flavor Paradise Restaurant
soal_pg.opsi_b: To persuade people to visit the restaurant
soal_pg.opsi_c: To tell the readers how to make a steak
soal_pg.opsi_d: To inform the location of the restaurant
soal_pg.pembahasan: Tujuan utama teks iklan (advertisement) adalah untuk mempromosikan atau membujuk (to persuade/to promote) orang agar membeli produk atau jasa yang ditawarkan.

soal_pg.tanya: Refer to the text in question no. 1. Who would likely be most interested in the 'Special Promo'?
soal_pg.opsi_a: A group of students working on a project
soal_pg.opsi_b: A couple who wants to have dinner
soal_pg.opsi_c: A family with many children having breakfast
soal_pg.opsi_d: A businessman having a meeting alone
soal_pg.pembahasan: Teks menyebutkan 'romantic atmosphere' dan promo 'Buy 1 Get 1 Free... on Saturday Night', yang sangat identik dengan pasangan (couple) yang ingin makan malam.

soal_pg.tanya: Refer to the text in question no. 1. 'We provide the best romantic **atmosphere**...' The underlined word is closest in meaning to...
soal_pg.pembahasan: Atmosphere dalam konteks tempat/restoran bersinonim dengan suasana atau 'Ambience'.

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**SALE! SALE! SALE!**
**SMARTPHONE X-200**

- 6.5 inch display
- 128 GB Storage
- Triple Camera
- Long-lasting battery (5000 mAh)

**Rp 2.500.000 (Normal Price Rp 3.500.000)**
Offer ends on January 31st.
Visit 'Tech World' Store now!

How much can we save if we buy the phone during the sale?
soal_pg.pembahasan: Harga normal Rp 3.500.000 - Harga diskon Rp 2.500.000 = Penghematan Rp 1.000.000.

soal_pg.tanya: Refer to the text in question no. 4. The text implies that the phone is suitable for people who...
soal_pg.opsi_a: Like to take photos and travel all day
soal_pg.opsi_b: Only use the phone for calling
soal_pg.pembahasan: Fitur 'Triple Camera' cocok untuk foto, dan 'Long-lasting battery' cocok untuk bepergian seharian.

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**URGENTLY REQUIRED**
**ENGLISH TUTOR**

Requirements:
1. Fluent in English (Active).
2. Minimum D3/S1 in any major.
3. Love children and teaching.
4. Patient and creative.

Send your CV to: smart_english@email.com
Before March 20th.

Which statement is TRUE based on the text?
soal_pg.opsi_a: The applicant must send the CV via post office
soal_pg.opsi_b: The applicant must be a Mathematics graduate
soal_pg.opsi_c: The applicant must be able to speak English
soal_pg.opsi_d: The vacancy is open until April
soal_pg.pembahasan: Syarat nomor 1 adalah 'Fluent in English (Active)', yang berarti pelamar harus bisa berbicara bahasa Inggris.

soal_pg.tanya: Refer to the text in question no. 6. 'Patient and creative.' The opposite meaning of 'Patient' is...
soal_pg.pembahasan: Lawan kata (antonym) dari 'Patient' (sabar) adalah 'Impatient' (tidak sabar).

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**CLEAN & SHINE LAUNDRY**

Too busy to wash your clothes? Let us help you!
- Wash & Fold: Rp 6.000/kg
- Wash & Iron: Rp 8.000/kg
- Dry Cleaning available.
- Free pick up and delivery for min. 10 kg.

Call us: 0812-3456-7890

What benefit will customers get if they have 12 kg of laundry?
soal_pg.opsi_a: They will get a discount price.
soal_pg.opsi_b: They don't need to pay for the laundry.
soal_pg.opsi_c: They don't need to go to the laundry shop.
soal_pg.pembahasan: Jika laundry 12 kg (di atas min. 10 kg), pelanggan mendapatkan 'Free pick up and delivery', artinya mereka tidak perlu pergi ke toko laundry (dijemput dan diantar).

soal_pg.tanya: Refer to the text in question no. 8. 'Let **us** help you!' The word 'us' refers to...
soal_pg.pembahasan: Kata 'us' merujuk pada penyedia jasa, yaitu pihak Clean & Shine Laundry.

soal_pg.tanya: Which of the following is NOT typically found in an advertisement?
soal_pg.pembahasan: Langkah-langkah membongkar produk biasanya ada di manual/procedure text, bukan di iklan. Iklan fokus pada keunggulan dan bujukan.

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**MILK-VITA**
High Calcium & Low Fat.
Best for your bone health.
Consume daily for better growth.
**Suitable for teenagers.**

What is the main benefit of consuming the product?
soal_pg.pembahasan: Tertulis jelas 'Best for your bone health' (Terbaik untuk kesehatan tulangmu).

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**HOTEL SANTIKA**
Located near the beautiful Kuta Beach.

Facilities:
- Swimming Pool
- Free Wi-Fi
- Breakfast included
- Airport Shuttle

Book now at www.hotelsantika.com

The text highlights that the hotel is strategically located because...
soal_pg.pembahasan: Keunggulan lokasi (strategically located) ditunjukkan dengan kalimat 'Located near the beautiful Kuta Beach'.

soal_pg.tanya: Refer to the text in question no. 12. 'Airport **Shuttle**'. The word 'Shuttle' means...
soal_pg.opsi_b: Transport service to travel back and forth
soal_pg.pembahasan: Airport Shuttle adalah layanan transportasi antar-jemput ke bandara.

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**MUSIC FESTIVAL 2024**
Featuring: Top Local Bands.
Date: Sunday, 15th May 2024
Venue: City Park Stadium
Ticket: Rp 50.000 (Presale), Rp 75.000 (On the spot)

If you buy the ticket on the day of the event, how much should you pay?
soal_pg.pembahasan: Membeli di hari acara sama dengan 'On the spot', harganya Rp 75.000.

soal_pg.tanya: What kind of language is mostly used in an advertisement?
soal_pg.pembahasan: Iklan menggunakan bahasa persuasif (membujuk) dan umumnya menggunakan Simple Present Tense.

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**FRESH & COOL AC REPAIR**

Does your AC not feel cold?
Is it leaking?
Call us! We fix all brands.
Expert Technicians.
**Warranty 30 days.**

What does 'Warranty 30 days' mean?
soal_pg.opsi_a: The repair takes 30 days to finish.
soal_pg.opsi_b: You must pay 30 days before repair.
soal_pg.opsi_c: If the problem returns within 30 days, they will fix it for free.
soal_pg.opsi_d: The AC will only work for 30 days.
soal_pg.pembahasan: Garansi 30 hari artinya jika ada masalah lagi dalam kurun waktu 30 hari, perbaikan ditanggung penyedia jasa (gratis).

soal_pg.tanya: Refer to the text in question no. 16. 'We **fix** all brands.' The synonym of the underlined word is...
soal_pg.pembahasan: Fix bersinonim dengan Repair (memperbaiki).

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**HERBAL TOOTHPASTE**
Made from natural mint and betel leaf.
Helps prevent cavities and bad breath.
**Safe for daily use.**

The advertisement claims that the product can solve the problem of...
soal_pg.pembahasan: 'Bad breath' artinya bau mulut atau smelly mouth.

soal_pg.tanya: Refer to the text in question no. 18. 'Prevent' means...
soal_pg.pembahasan: Prevent artinya mencegah, atau menghentikan sesuatu agar tidak terjadi.

soal_pg.tanya: Which phrase indicates a 'Limited Offer'?
soal_pg.opsi_c: Grab it fast, while stock lasts!
soal_pg.pembahasan: 'While stock lasts' (selama persediaan masih ada) menandakan penawaran terbatas (limited).

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**ROOM FOR RENT**
Cozy room for students.
Near University of Jakarta.
Full furnished (Bed, Cupboard, Desk).
AC and Wifi included.
Rp 1.500.000 / month.
Contact: Mr. Ahmad (0811...)

Who is the target audience for this advertisement?
soal_pg.pembahasan: Tertulis 'Cozy room for students' dan 'Near University', jadi targetnya adalah mahasiswa.

soal_pg.tanya: Refer to the text in question no. 21. What facility is NOT mentioned in the text?
soal_pg.pembahasan: Bed, AC, Wifi (Internet) disebutkan. Private Kitchen tidak disebutkan.

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**PIZZA YUMMY**
Delivery Order Only.
All Pizzas are 20% OFF today!
Code: YUMMY20

How can we buy the pizza?
soal_pg.opsi_a: We can eat at the restaurant.
soal_pg.opsi_b: We must order it to be delivered home.
soal_pg.opsi_c: We have to cook it ourselves.
soal_pg.opsi_d: We must go to the supermarket.
soal_pg.pembahasan: Tertulis 'Delivery Order Only', artinya hanya bisa pesan antar, tidak bisa makan di tempat (Dine-in).

soal_pg.tanya: Why do advertisements often use colorful pictures and catchy slogans?
soal_pg.pembahasan: Gambar dan slogan menarik bertujuan menarik perhatian (attract attention).

soal_pg.tanya:
Read the text!

**LOST CAT**
Name: Fluffy. White fur, blue eyes.
Last seen: Mawar Street.
Reward: Rp 500.000.
Call: 0812...

What should you do if you find the cat?
soal_pg.pembahasan: Jika menemukan kucing hilang sesuai iklan, tindakan yang diharapkan adalah menghubungi nomor yang tertera.

soal_essay.tanya: Explain the general structure/parts of an advertisement text!
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap:
The general structure of an advertisement usually consists of:
1. Title/Name of Product: The name of the product or service.
2. Explanation/Description: Details about the product's features, benefits, or specifications.
3. Persuasive/Selling Point: Discounts, special offers, or unique qualities.
4. Contact Information: Phone number, address, website, or social media where customers can buy or ask.

soal_essay.tanya:
Read the text below and identify: a) The Product, b) The Target Audience, c) The Contact Info.

'Glow Up Face Wash. Removes oil and acne instantly! Best for oily skin. Get yours at the nearest pharmacy or call 1500-GLOW.'
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap:
a) The Product: Glow Up Face Wash.
b) The Target Audience: People with oily skin and acne problems.
c) The Contact Info: Nearest pharmacy or call 1500-GLOW.

soal_essay.tanya: Write a short advertisement slogan for a 'Spicy Fried Chicken' product!
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap: Sample Answer (Creativity based): 'Feel the Burn, Taste the Joy! The Spiciest Chicken in Town!'

soal_essay.tanya:
Compare these two offers. Which one is cheaper for a single item purchase?
Offer A: Buy 1 Get 1 Free (Price Rp 100.000).
Offer B: 30% Discount (Price Rp 60.000).
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap:
Analysis:
- Offer A: You pay Rp 100.000 for 2 items. So, 1 item = Rp 50.000.
- Offer B: You pay 70% of Rp 60.000 = Rp 42.000 for 1 item.
Conclusion: Offer B is cheaper if you only want to calculate the cost per single item/unit, but Offer A gives more items.

soal_essay.tanya: Analyze the meaning of the phrase 'Terms and Conditions Apply' often found in advertisements.
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap: It means that the offer, discount, or promise in the advertisement is not absolute. There are specific rules, requirements, or limitations (like time limit, minimum purchase, specific user) that the customer must fulfill to get the benefit.

soal_essay.tanya:
Translate the following advertisement sentence into Indonesian:
'Book your ticket now before it's sold out! Limited seats available.'
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap: Pesan tiketmu sekarang sebelum kehabisan! Tempat duduk terbatas.

soal_essay.tanya: Why is it important to include 'testimonials' or 'reviews' in an online advertisement?
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap: Testimonials or reviews build trust (credibility). When potential customers see that other people have bought and liked the product, they are more likely to believe the advertisement and make a purchase.

soal_essay.tanya: Create a simple Job Vacancy advertisement for a 'Chef' position at a restaurant. Include at least 2 requirements.
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap:
**JOB VACANCY: CHEF**
We are looking for a professional Chef to join 'Tasty Resto'.
Requirements:
1. Minimum 2 years of experience in cooking.
2. Able to work in a team and under pressure.
Send your CV to tastyresto@email.com.

soal_essay.tanya:
Find the synonym of the underlined words:
'The car is very **economical** and **spacious**.'
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap:
Economical = Cheap / Cost-effective / Fuel-efficient.
Spacious = Large / Roomy / Big.

soal_essay.tanya: If an advertisement says 'satisfaction guaranteed or your money back', what does the seller promise?
soal_essay.jawaban_lengkap: The seller promises that if the customer is not happy or satisfied with the product quality, the seller will return the money (refund) to the customer.
